long_description: Ideal for summer commuting or pedaling your way to a picnic, the Terry Metro Bike Skort offers skirt styling with the support and comfort of cycling shorts. Skirt is made of a stretch woven nylon/spandex blend; moisture-wicking, quick-dry fabric is incredibly soft and extends leg coverage when you're off the bike. Mesh inner shorts offer a streamlined fit and are made of silky-soft matte nylon/spandex that supports muscles and dries quickly. Comfort chamois features anatomical shaping, stretch, and mono-density foam to reduce pressure points. Zippered thigh pocket on skirt holds a few small essentials, and woven grippers on the leg openings keep shorts from creeping up. Features a wide waistband for comfort in an aerodynamic position on the bike; 2 rear waistband snap adjusters let you dial in the fit. Outer skirt is 16 in. long and features a zip and snap closure. Reflective details on front enhance visibility.
